description: Integrate coderef-core scanning logic into dashboard UI (Step 1 of incremental build)

orchestrator_instructions.role: Coordinate agents and verify integration works end-to-end

steps.step_1: READ each agent's output.json to understand what was implemented
steps.step_2: VERIFY that coderef-core exposes scanning API
steps.step_3: VERIFY that dashboard scanner component can call coderef-core
steps.step_4: CREATE orchestrator-output.json with integration status and next steps

agent_instructions.role: Implement assigned piece of scanner integration

steps.step_1: READ your section of instructions below
steps.step_2: IMPLEMENT the simple, focused task assigned to you
steps.step_3: CREATE output.json at your path in communication.json with what you did

coderef-system_specific.task: Ensure coderef package can bridge coderef-core to dashboard
instructions: READ coderef-core to understand what scanning functions exist
DOCUMENT the API surface for dashboard consumption
coderef-system_specific.deliverable: JSON with exported functions and usage examples

coderef-core_specific.task: Expose core scanning functionality in a simple, consumable way
instructions: IDENTIFY the main scanning entry point (likely scan() or similar)
ENSURE it's exported and callable from outside packages
DOCUMENT the function signature and expected inputs/outputs
coderef-core_specific.deliverable: JSON with function signature, parameters, and return type

dashboard-scanner_specific.task: Create basic scanner UI component that can call coderef-core
instructions: CREATE a simple React component in scanner directory
IMPORT the scanning function from coderef-core (via coderef package)
ADD a button that triggers the scan (hardcoded path for now)
DISPLAY scan results in a simple <pre> tag
dashboard-scanner_specific.deliverable: JSON with component file path, key functions, and basic usage

quality_standards.completeness: Each agent completes their specific task and creates output.json
quality_standards.accuracy: Exported functions are documented with signatures
quality_standards.format: All outputs must be valid JSON matching the template structure
